function.name: scan_newsletters
function.description: Scan Gmail for newsletter subscriptions over a specified time period. Identifies emails with List-Unsubscribe headers.

days_back.description: How many days to look back for analysis (defaults to MAX_LOOKBACK_DAYS env variable if not specified)

function.name: analyze_engagement
function.description: Analyze open/read rates for specific newsletter senders by checking read/unread status of their emails.

newsletter_ids.description: List of newsletter sender email addresses to analyze

threshold_days.description: Only analyze newsletters received within this many days

function.name: extract_unsubscribe_links
function.description: Extract unsubscribe links from newsletters using the List-Unsubscribe header or email body.

sender_emails.description: Newsletter sender email addresses to extract unsubscribe links from
